title: Bandelier National Monument: Evening Programs
body: Evening Programs         Topics for evening programs vary so check the schedule posted at the Juniper Campground amphitheater or in front of the visitor center. photo by sally king  Interpretive evening programs will be offered Saturday nights in July and August 2016. During the summer, weekly schedules will be posted at the Visitor Center and the Juniper Campground. Program times vary depending on sunset. Topics are also very diverse and will be posted here as available.
